webhook_owner_check.name: webhook_owner_check
webhook_owner_check.value: ("trigger_id" IS NOT NULL AND "provider_id" IS NULL) OR ("trigger_id" IS NULL AND "provider_id" IS NOT NULL)

chk_namespace_single_owner.name: chk_namespace_single_owner
chk_namespace_single_owner.value: (("user_owner_id" IS NOT NULL)::int + ("organization_owner_id" IS NOT NULL)::int = 1)
